{{Description|You and Paimon studied the light that flashes through the clouds.}}
'''Bellowing Thunder''' is [[Traveler (Electro)]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This talent can hit a theoretical maximum of 24 times. In practice, hitting more than 14 times is a feat.
* Falling Thunder can trigger when hitting certain non-living targetable objects, such as [[Bloom|Dendro Cores]] and [[Tri-Lakshana Creatures]], and will restore Energy for the active character when doing so.
